attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: So well this president has a lot of problems and I think he needs to get impeached or something but really I am just hear to delete this app so he won’t remove TikTok everyone give it a one star first you have to download it then rate it

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: Once I downloaded this app I realized what a big mistake I made .  When you open the app it shoots out this orange spray from your iPhone camera and makes you identical to trump . 1/10 would not recommend I haven’t been able to get the face tan outta my face .

attributes.title: Ew
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app for research purposes to help our annoying orange and it kept crashing! Then my phone shut off and on, saying things like “trump 2020” and “all lives matter “ in a Karen voice! It scared me so bad I’m still not sleeping in the room where it happened!

attributes.title: No just no
attributes.review: When I try to download the app it took so long for it I have to wait a week for it to download eventually I got irritated it it has the worst possible service it was super slow and I didn’t get what I wanted on the app so I just deleted it😔

attributes.title: Absolutely disgusting
attributes.review: To be honest I was about to support out president but once I tried to keep up with the news it kept crashing hella ads would pop up and to be honest false news were on the app as well and that’s on period!

attributes.title: Go Badie🧚🏻✨😊❤️without the bad!🧚🏻✨😊❤️

Trumps nudes were the first thing I saw and I am now very much traumatized so if President🍊sees this review come get me asshat, I can operate a gun! Thank you very much for letting me rant about our very much racist and sexist 🍊President!

attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.title: this app is BAD
attributes.review: This app constantly kept kicking me off and just going right back to my home screen. this could be because the app is trying to allow itself to take my data without permission.
